sentences.sentence: Goldenrods are members of the sunflower family (Asteraceae).
sentences.translation: 黄花是家族成员的向日葵(菊)。

sentences.sentence: Often very annoying weeds, goldenrods crowd out less hardy plants and act as hosts to many insect pests.
sentences.translation: 杂草和秋麒麟草通常令人生厌，它挤走不那么顽强的植物，并找来很多害虫。

sentences.sentence: Often very annoying weeds, goldenrods crowd out less hardy plants and act as hosts to many insect pests.
sentences.translation: 花通常令人生厌，它挤走不那么顽强的植物，并找来很多害虫。
